title: Role-based Authentication - Valid Login
description: Verify that users with Admin, Engineer, Employee, and Cashier roles can successfully login with valid credentials and access their appropriate dashboards.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid credentials for each role (Admin, Engineer, Employee, Cashier) one by one.
Click the login button.
Verify successful login and redirection to the role-specific dashboard.
Verify user access is limited to permitted features only.

title: Role-based Authentication - Invalid Login
description: Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and appropriate error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username or password.
Click the login button.
Verify login failure with clear error message displayed to user.

title: Unauthorized Access Prevention
description: Ensure users cannot access routes or features outside their assigned roles.

steps.description: Login as each role separately.
Attempt to directly navigate to unauthorized routes and access restricted features.
Verify access is denied and proper error or redirect occurs.

title: Expense Report Creation and Submission
description: Test that an Employee can create an expense report with multiple line items, upload receipt attachments, and submit the report successfully.

steps.description: Login as Employee.
Navigate to expense creation page.
Fill in required fields and add multiple detailed line items.
Upload one or more receipt files.
Verify form validation accepts correct data and displays uploaded file names.
Submit the expense report.
Verify the expense report is saved successfully with status 'Pending Engineer Review' and visible in the employee's expense list.

title: Expense Report Creation - Invalid Data Validation
description: Verify form validation prevents submission when required fields are missing, or data formats are incorrect.

steps.description: Login as Employee.
Open expense creation form.
Enter invalid values such as negative amounts, empty required fields, or invalid dates.
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify validation error messages are displayed for each invalid input preventing submission.

title: Engineer Review - Approve, Modification Request, Reject
description: Verify the Engineer role can review submitted expenses, update status to approved, request modifications, or reject with comments.

steps.description: Login as Engineer.
Open list of expense reports pending engineer review.
Open a submitted expense report.
Verify detailed line items and attachments can be viewed.
Approve the expense.
Verify status changes to 'Approved by Engineer' and notification is sent.
Request modifications with comments on a different expense report.
Verify status is 'Modification Requested' and employee receives comments.
Reject another expense report providing rejection reasons.
Verify status is 'Rejected by Engineer' with comments visible.

title: Admin Final Approval and Expense Deduction
description: Test the Admin's ability to review Engineer-approved expenses, give final approval, and trigger automatic deduction from employee's balance.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Open the list of expenses approved by Engineer.
Review detailed expense report and attachments.
Approve the expense.
Verify expense status changes to 'Final Approved' and employee balance is reduced by the expense amount.
Verify real-time balance updates are visible on employee and Admin dashboards.

title: Admin User Creation and Role Assignment
description: Verify that Admin can create new users with assigned roles and set initial balances correctly.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to User Management page.
Create a new user with all required fields and assign a role.
Set initial balance for the created user.
Save the new user.
Verify new user appears in user list with correct role and balance.
Attempt to create user with missing required fields.
Verify form validation prevents user creation and displays error messages.

title: Cashier Adding Funds and Balance Deduction
description: Ensure Cashier can add funds to other users' accounts and balance deductions from Cashier's account are updated.

steps.description: Login as Cashier.
Navigate to balance management page.
Select a user and add funds to their balance.
Verify the selected user's balance increases by the correct amount.
Verify Cashier's own balance decreases accordingly.

title: File Upload - Receipt Upload and Secure Storage
description: Verify that users can upload expense receipt files which are securely stored and accessible only by authorized users.

steps.description: Login as Employee.
Create a new expense report and upload multiple files of allowed types and sizes.
Verify files upload successfully with progress indicator within 5 seconds.
Verify uploaded files are linked correctly to the expense report.
Attempt to access uploaded files as unauthorized user.
Verify access is denied to unauthorized users.
Attempt to upload invalid file types or oversized files.
Verify validation prevents upload and displays error feedback.

title: Form Validation with Zod Schemas
description: Ensure that all forms (expense, user management, balance management) enforce data validation using Zod schemas and provide meaningful error feedback.

steps.description: Access various forms in the system.
Enter invalid data such as missing mandatory fields, wrong formats, or out-of-bound values.
Verify form validation errors appear correctly next to each invalid input.
Correct the inputs and re-submit.
Verify forms accept valid data successfully.

title: Real-time Balance Update and Overspending Prevention
description: Verify that user balances are updated in real-time on all dashboards and that the system prevents users from submitting expenses that exceed their available balance.

steps.description: Login as Employee with limited balance.
Create an expense exceeding the current balance.
Attempt to submit the expense.
Verify system prevents submission and displays an error about insufficient balance.
Submit a valid expense within balance.
Verify balance updates immediately in employee dashboard and reflects deduction.

title: Role-specific Dashboards Display
description: Verify each user role sees a dashboard with correct personalized data including expense statuses, notifications, and analytics charts.

steps.description: Login as Admin, Engineer, Employee, and Cashier individually.
Navigate to respective dashboards.
Verify data shown matches role-specific expectations: appropriate expense summaries, notifications, and analytics.
Verify notifications update dynamically on status changes.

title: Comprehensive Error Handling and Logging
description: Ensure that system errors, including network failures and unexpected exceptions, are handled gracefully with user feedback and error boundaries without crashing the app and that error information is logged appropriately.

steps.description: Simulate API failure or server error during critical operations like login, expense submission, or balance update.
Verify user-friendly error messages are displayed.
Verify error boundaries prevent app crash and provide recovery options.
Verify error details are logged for debugging (log files or monitoring system).

title: Performance Validation - Page Load and File Upload
description: Verify that page load times do not exceed 3 seconds and file uploads complete within 5 seconds for typical network conditions.

steps.description: Load various key pages: login, dashboard, expense creation, user management.
Measure and confirm page load time is under 3 seconds.
Upload expense receipts of typical sizes via file upload component.
Verify upload completes within 5 seconds with data correctly saved.

title: Responsive UI on Desktop and Mobile
description: Verify the application UI renders properly and is fully functional on desktop and major mobile devices.

steps.description: Access the application on desktop browsers of different screen resolutions.
Verify layout is consistent, controls are accessible, and data displays correctly.
Access application on mobile devices (iOS and Android) with different screen sizes.
Verify responsive design adapts layout, with functional navigation and forms.
